name: Create Airtable records from Slack messages that contain a specific word
description: This automation watches a public channel for messages that contain a specific word/s, retrieves the information and creates records on Airtable. This automation uses this [Airtable template](https://airtable.com/shrbVG7rZDRdphG3M/tblX7N1Vs3T7qODgM/viwqZOgrmX3S4Pr03?blocks=hide). Feel free to adjust the table to your needs.
